questions.question: 1. Which is true for uniaxial tensile engineering stress-strain curve of a polycrystalline aluminum?

answers.a: Yield strength is more than ultimate tensile strength
answers.b: Fracture stress is less than ultimate tensile strength
answers.c: Slope of the stress-strain curve is the stiffness
answers.d: The maximum stress is called yield point

questions.question: 2. Which one among the following exhibits highest modulus?
3. For which of the following stress-strain curve is linear till fracture?
4. Which material show a whole range of stress-strain responses, depending on conditions, from very creepy behavior to stiff elastic behavior, a rubbery range in between.
5. Which one of the following is true for the stress-strain curve of thermoplastic polymer?

answers.b: Necking takes place after elastic regime
answers.c: The curve continuously goes up till fracture
answers.d: The curve goes up till UTS point and then goes down till fracture
